queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller:core}}.rules[6].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller:core}}.rules[6].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:reports-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:reports-controller:core}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-installer}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller:core}}.rules[6].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller:core}}.rules[6].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:reports-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:reports-controller:core}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.volumeMounts.name={{home-vol}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.volumeMounts.name={{home-vol}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.volumeMounts.name={{local-vol}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.volumeMounts.name={{local-vol}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kyverno-installer.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=kyverno-installer.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kyverno-installer.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=kyverno-installer.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-installer.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller}}.rules[3] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller}}.rules[3] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.rules[7] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.rules[7] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller}}.rules[1] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller}}.rules[1] is granted read access (verbs: delete, get, list, update, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch, create, update, delete) to Secrets objects

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["delete", "get", "list", "update", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:cleanup-controller}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["delete", "get", "list", "update", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:background-controller}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "delete"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kyverno:admission-controller}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "delete"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl has resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl doesn't have resources defined

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=nirmata-kyverno-operator has CPU limits
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=nirmata-kyverno-operator doesn't have CPU limits

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl has CPU limits
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl doesn't have CPU limits

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=nirmata-kyverno-operator.resources should have requests defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=nirmata-kyverno-operator.resources doesn't have requests defined

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl should have resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl doesn't have resources defined

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl.resources should have requests defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl.resources doesn't have requests defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubectl}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubectl}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubectl}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubectl}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nirmata-kyverno-operator}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator-operator-cleanup}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-nirmata-kyverno-operator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kyverno-hook-post-upgrade}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
